about_the_game:
What is Forbidden City Journey?

This is a VR panoramic tour of the Forbidden City of China. Players can tour the Forbidden City and learn about its history through the game

The game has a kitten NPC, which will act as a guide to introduce players to various scenes in the Forbidden City. The Forbidden City is full of fun to visit through the real picture, so that players can feel the solemnity and majesty of the Forbidden City without leaving home. There are also some mini games designed based on cultural and historical events, through which players can have a better understanding of the cultural knowledge of the Forbidden City. This will increase players' interest in the Forbidden City and even Chinese culture.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, need Quest1&2/Pico/vive/index controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, need Quest1&2/Pico/vive/index controller

short_description: This is a VR tour game based on the real picture, which can not only allows players to immerse themselves in the majesty of the Forbidden City, but also to understand the culture and history of the Forbidden City through a mini-game.
